crypto|users|usersnode: A BIGSERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each user (e.g., 1001).
crypto|users|userstamp: A CHAR(36) UUID linking to external/client user references (e.g., 'e3bd1f12-3e93-4b3c-a9f3-84be2593a6d7').
crypto|users|acctscope: An enum (AcctScope_enum) indicating the account scope (Margin, Spot, Options, Futures).
crypto|orders|orderspivot: A BIGSERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each order (e.g., 15002).
crypto|orders|exchspot: A CHAR(10) referencing the exchange ID (e.g., 'BINANCE').
crypto|orders|mktnote: A VARCHAR(30) naming the market pair or trading symbol (e.g., 'BTC/USDT').
crypto|orders|orderstamp: A CHAR(36) external or client order ID (e.g., 'CL-3c4a8f89-9aed').
crypto|orders|userlink: A CHAR(36) FK to Users(UserStamp), linking this order to its owner.
crypto|orders|ordertune: An enum (OrderTune_enum) describing order type (Stop, Market, Limit, StopLimit).
crypto|orders|dealquote: A DECIMAL(12,3) capturing the limit or stop price (e.g., '27800.500').
crypto|orders|dealcount: A NUMERIC(12,4) for the order quantity (e.g., '0.1250').
crypto|orders|orderflow: An enum (OrderFlow_enum) describing the status (New, PartiallyFilled, Cancelled, Filled).
crypto|orders|timespan: An enum (TimeSpan_enum) for time-in-force (IOC, GTC, GTD, FOK).
crypto|orders|orderbase: An enum (OrderBase_enum) indicating how the order was placed (API, Web, Mobile, Bot).
crypto|orders|clientmark: A VARCHAR(80) holding an optional client-supplied tag (e.g., 'myXtrOrder001').
crypto|orders|createspot: A TIMESTAMP showing when the order was first persisted (e.g., '2025-05-10 13:45:00').
crypto|orders|updatespot: A TIMESTAMP noting the last update to this order (e.g., '2025-05-10 14:02:15').
crypto|orderexecutions|orderexecmark: A BIGSERIAL primary key for each fill/execution (e.g., 210345).
crypto|orderexecutions|fillcount: A DECIMAL(8,4) showing how many units were filled (e.g., '0.0500').
crypto|orderexecutions|remaincount: A NUMERIC(8,4) showing how many units remain unfilled (e.g., '0.0750').
crypto|orderexecutions|fillquote: A DECIMAL(12,3) capturing the fill price (e.g., '27699.150').
crypto|orderexecutions|fillsum: A DECIMAL(12,3) notional of the fill (e.g., '1384.958').
crypto|orderexecutions|expirespot: A TIMESTAMP if the partial fill or order slice expires (e.g., '2025-05-10 15:00:00').
crypto|orderexecutions|cancelnote: An enum (CancelNote_enum) describing cancel reason (Expired, InsufficientFunds, UserRequested).
crypto|orderexecutions|exectune: An enum (ExecTune_enum) indicating execution style (Maker, Taker).
crypto|orderexecutions|ordersmark: A CHAR(36) referencing Orders(RecordVault) to link back to the original order.
crypto|fees|feesnode: A BIGSERIAL primary key for fee records (e.g., 30012).
crypto|fees|feerange: An enum (FeeRange_enum) describing the user's fee tier (Tier4, Tier1, Tier3, Tier2).
crypto|fees|feecoin: An enum (FeeCoin_enum) for the currency used to pay fees (USDC, USD, USDT).
crypto|fees|rebrate: A DECIMAL(8,5) capturing the maker rebate rate (e.g., '0.00015').
crypto|fees|orderslink: A CHAR(36) referencing Orders(RecordVault), linking fees to a specific order.
crypto|marketdata|marketdatanode: A BIGSERIAL PK identifying a market data snapshot (e.g., 987654).
crypto|marketstats|marketstatsmark: A BIGSERIAL PK for market stats (e.g., 112233).
crypto|marketstats|fundrate: A DECIMAL(6,4) funding rate for futures (e.g., '0.0100').
crypto|marketstats|fundspot: A TIMESTAMP for next or recent funding event (e.g., '2025-05-11 08:00:00').
crypto|marketstats|mktsize: A NUMERIC(13,3) total market cap or size (e.g., '125000000.000').
crypto|marketstats|maxsupply: A NUMERIC(13,3) maximum supply if applicable (e.g., '21000000.000').
crypto|marketstats|mkthold: A DECIMAL(13,3) market dominance or share (e.g., '45.000').
crypto|marketstats|traderank: An INTEGER rank for volume or liquidity (e.g., 2).
crypto|marketstats|volmeter: A DECIMAL(8,2) volatility or fluctuation rating (e.g., '35.50').
crypto|marketstats|mdlink: A BIGINT FK to MarketData(MarketDataNode), associating stats with a snapshot.
crypto|analyticsindicators|analyticsindi: A BIGSERIAL PK for analytics records (e.g., 99999).
crypto|riskandmargin|riskandmarginpivot: A BIGSERIAL PK for risk/margin records (e.g., 444444).
crypto|accountbalances|accountbalancesno: A BIGSERIAL PK for each balance record (e.g., 88888).
crypto|systemmonitoring|systemmonitoring: A BIGSERIAL PK for system monitoring info (e.g., 56789).
crypto|systemmonitoring|apireqtotal: An INTEGER counting total API requests in a window (e.g., 45230).
crypto|systemmonitoring|apierrtotal: An INTEGER total of API errors (e.g., 123).
crypto|systemmonitoring|apilatmark: A REAL capturing average API latency (e.g., 150.2).
crypto|systemmonitoring|wsstate: An enum (WSState_enum) describing websocket state (Connected, Disconnected).
crypto|systemmonitoring|rateremain: A SMALLINT for remaining requests before rate limit (e.g., 75).
crypto|systemmonitoring|lastupdnote: A VARCHAR(60) short note on last system update (e.g., 'AutoScale triggered').
crypto|systemmonitoring|seqcode: A VARCHAR(60) sequence/version code for real-time updates (e.g., 'seq-0012').
crypto|systemmonitoring|exectimespan: A DECIMAL(8,2) typical order execution time in ms or s (e.g., '12.50').
crypto|systemmonitoring|queueline: An INTEGER tracking queued tasks or orders (e.g., 45).
crypto|systemmonitoring|mkteffect: A REAL approximating internal market impact (e.g., 1.2).
crypto|systemmonitoring|priceeffect: A REAL approximating net price improvement (e.g., 0.4).
crypto|systemmonitoring|aitrack: A BIGINT FK to AnalyticsIndicators(AnalyticsIndicatorsNode), linking to advanced analytics.

crypto|riskandmargin|risk_margin_profile.column_meaning: JSONB column. Bundles leverage settings, margin thresholds, liquidation levels, iceberg layout, multifaceted risk labels, position sizing, margin‑call figures, and collateral details into one field for rapid risk evaluation.

leverage.margform: An enum (MargForm_enum) for margin mode (Isolated, Cross).

iceberg.icebcount: A DOUBLE PRECISION iceberg hidden portion (e.g., 3.25).

risk_factors.liqfactor: A VARCHAR(20) label for liquidation risk (e.g., 'HighRisk').
risk_factors.cpfactor: A VARCHAR(30) label for counterparty risk (e.g., 'Tier2Counterparty').

position.poscount: A DECIMAL(12,3) position size in base units (e.g., '0.300').
position.possum: A DECIMAL(12,3) notional value of position (e.g., '8100.000').
position.posedge: An enum (PosEdge_enum) for position direction (Short, Long).

margin_rates.bkptquote: A DECIMAL(12,3) bankruptcy or forced liquidation price (e.g., '25000.000').

collateral.collcoin: An enum (CollCoin_enum) referencing collateral currency (USDT, USDC, BTC, ETH).
collateral.insfundshare: A DECIMAL(12,3) portion allocated from the insurance fund (e.g., '50.000').

crypto|marketdata|quote_depth_snapshot.column_meaning: JSONB column. Captures a full market‑microstructure snapshot—best quotes, size, depth, spreads, and derived mid/mark/index prices—inside a single JSONB column.

metadata.mktcombo: A VARCHAR(30) naming the trading pair (e.g., 'ETH/USDT').
metadata.timetrack: A TIMESTAMP noting when data was recorded (e.g., '2025-05-10 13:45:30').

quotes.markquote: A DECIMAL(12,3) reference 'mark' price for derivatives (e.g., '27553.000').
quotes.indexquote: A DECIMAL(12,3) index price if used (e.g., '27560.125').

depth.bidunits: A NUMERIC(12,4) quantity at best bid (e.g., '12.5000').
depth.askunits: A NUMERIC(12,4) quantity at best ask (e.g., '8.0000').
depth.biddepth: A REAL summarizing deeper bid liquidity (e.g., 56.7).
depth.askdepth: A REAL summarizing deeper ask liquidity (e.g., 42.1).

spread.spreadband: A DOUBLE PRECISION for raw spread (e.g., 4.850).
spread.spreadrate: A DECIMAL(8,4) spread as a ratio or percentage (e.g., '0.0175').

crypto|analyticsindicators|market_sentim.column_meaning: JSONB column. Aggregates order‑book walls, momentum gauges, technical oscillators, flow imbalances, large‑player activity, and arbitrage signals to streamline advanced analytics and back‑testing.

walls.buywallband: A DECIMAL(10,3) measuring buy wall distance (e.g., '450.500').
walls.sellwallband: A DECIMAL(10,3) measuring sell wall distance (e.g., '480.250').

momentum.mktfeel: An enum (MktFeel_enum) for overall sentiment (Bearish, Bullish, Neutral).
momentum.techmeter: An enum (TechMeter_enum) summarizing technical signals (Buy, Sell, Hold).

flow.flowimbal: A DOUBLE PRECISION for order-flow imbalance (e.g., 12.5).
flow.tradeimbal: A DOUBLE PRECISION for trade-flow imbalance (e.g., -8.75).
flow.largeflowrate: A DECIMAL(12,3) fraction of large orders (e.g., '0.125').

big_players.whalemotion: An enum (WhaleMotion_enum) for large trader activity (Low, Medium, High).
big_players.makermotion: An enum (MakerMotion_enum) for market maker activity (Low, Medium, High).

arbitrage.basisgap: A NUMERIC(10,4) basis spread (futures vs spot) (e.g., '0.0300').
